title: How This Marine Became a Killer
description:
Daniel Penny choked Jordan Neely to death on a Manhattan subway. Instead of being charged with Murder, Penny was framed as a hero in the media while Neely, the victim, was vilified and blamed for his death. This is the result of the dehumanization of Black and homeless people and the policy choices of Mayor Eric Adams and Governor Kathy Hochul.
